TOKEN.description: Bot Token Kalian, bikin bot di @BotFather jika kalian belum memiliki bot.

URL.description: The Heroku App URL similar to https://<appname>.herokuapp.com/

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: Cantumkan Chat ID grup anda, opsional: obrolan tempat balasan Anda menyimpan pesan, untuk menghentikan orang menghapus pesan lama mereka.

SUDO_USERS.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered sudo users (Tambahkan USER ID kalian).

SUPPORT_USERS.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered support users can gban/ungban, nothing else (Tambahkan USER ID kalian).

WHITELIST_USERS.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered whitelisted - they can't be banned (Tambahkan USER ID kalian).

DONATION_LINK.description: Optional: link where you would like to receive donations.

PORT.description: Port to use for your webhooks

DEL_CMDS.description: Apakah akan menghapus perintah dari pengguna yang tidak memiliki hak untuk menggunakan perintah itu.

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Apakah akan mengizinkan penggunaan tanda seru!  untuk perintah serta /.

BAN_STICKER.description: Stiker yang akan digunakan saat banning orang. Gunakan https://telegram.dog/ShowJsonBot untuk mendapatkan file_id.
